Combat
Hit Points: 68 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: None Weapons: Maul (+5 2d6+1); Net (+5 None+1 R5/15); Shortsword (+5 1d6+1); Unarmed (+5 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Bonus Proficiencies (Tempest Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)/Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +30
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 1
Divine Strike: Weapon inflicts +1d8 HP thunder once per rd
Heavy Armor Master: Suffers -3 HP damage from nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapons when wearing heavy armor
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (save DC 13 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Wrath Of The Storm: Can use a reaction to inflict 2d8 HP lightning or thunder (save Dexterity half) on a successful attacker once per long rest
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 5; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 5
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 2 Attack: C: 5 Spell DC: C: 13
Spells:
Bane (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Banishment (C4 Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (C3 Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Call Lightning (C3 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' 5' radius inflicts 3d10 HP lightning (save Dexterity half; +1d10 HP if using a natural storm) once per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Command (C1 Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Contagion (C5 Necr): Touched suffers poisoned (save Constitution each turn; 3 successes ends, and 3 failures inflict a choice of disease for 7 days)
Control Water (C4 [Tempest Domain] Tran): R300' Water in a 100' cube rises 20', parts, redirects, or forms a whirlpool for concentration up to 10 min
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+1 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Destructive Wave (C5 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, knocked prone, and 5d6 HP of a choice of radiant or necrotic (save Constitution half HP only) on chosen targets
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Fog Cloud (C1 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Gentle Repose (C2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 days [R]
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or until 60 HP inflicted
Gust Of Wind (C2 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (save Strength negates), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for concentration up to 1 min
Ice Storm (C4 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) and becomes difficult terrain for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Insect Plague (C5 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (save Constitution half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Legend Lore (C5 Divi): Reveals info about a specified person, place, or object
Lesser Restoration (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Locate Creature (C4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Shatter (C2 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Sleet Storm (C3 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched dying creature becomes stable
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Thunderwave (C1 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 2 times per short rest
Destructive Wrath: Can use Channel Divinity to maximize lightning or thunder damage
Divine Intervention: Has a 10% chance to gain help from Greek-Poseidon once per week
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Thunderbolt Strike: Can cause lightning damage to also push away Large and smaller creatures 10'
